title: Bug splat
body: I got into a ranked game recently and i got bug splat, tried to reconnect bug splat again and again, my team remaked i got leaverbuster lost lp, and now i have low priority que, this has ahppned tons of times now and its just frustrating, i need me some help.

replies.body: Those bug splats typically mean that something has critically failed with your version of the client. It could be happening because of some of your game files are damaged or corrupted. Let's make sure to go through all the steps in our [**crash guide**](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201761974), which covers most of the typical fixes for bugsplats. Hit me back up if that doesn't get you back in ranked!
